games.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: Embark on an epic adventure as Link to rescue Princess Zelda and save Hyrule from calamity.

games.title: Super Mario Odyssey
games.description: Join Mario on a globe-trotting journey to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches.

games.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: Experience the life of an outlaw in the vast and stunning open world of the Wild West.

games.title: God of War
games.description: Embark on a brutal and mythological quest as Kratos, the Spartan warrior.

games.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.description: Immerse yourself in a rich and immersive fantasy world as Geralt of Rivia, the monster slayer.

games.title: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
games.description: Join Nathan Drake on his final adventure as he unravels the mystery behind a long-lost pirate treasure.

games.title: Minecraft
games.description: Build and explore limitless worlds in this popular sandbox game.

games.title: Fortnite
games.description: Engage in a fast-paced battle royale game and be the last one standing.

games.title: Overwatch
games.description: Join a team of heroes and engage in intense team-based battles to save the world.

games.title: Final Fantasy VII Remake
games.description: Relive the epic tale of Cloud Strife and his allies as they battle against the powerful Shinra corporation.

games.title: Grand Theft Auto V
games.description: Step into the shoes of three unique criminals in this sprawling open-world crime epic.

games.title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: Embark on a Viking saga as Eivor and lead your clan to conquer the lands of England.

games.title: FIFA 21
games.description: Play the beautiful game of soccer with realistic graphics and immersive gameplay.

games.title: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: Enter the futuristic world of Night City and become a cyber-enhanced mercenary.
